headline: Wolfe Research Reaffirms Outperform on Micron (MU) After Upbeat Preannouncement
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the AI Stocks Analysts Are Watching Closely. On August 11, Wolfe Research analyst Chris Caso reiterated an Outperform rating on the stock with a $160.00 price target. The rating reiteration follows Micron pre-announcing its fiscal Q4 results ahead of a competitor conference. Micron revealed that revenue would be approximately $500 […]

headline: Tepper’s Appaloosa Raises Stake in UnitedHealth, Adds Intel
summary: David Tepper’s Appaloosa snapped up shares of  UnitedHealth  Group during the second quarter and took new stakes in Intel and other stocks, according to a regulatory filing.  The investment manager increased Appaloosa’s UnitedHealth holdings to 2.45 million shares, up from 180,000 shares in the first quarter.  The latest stake, as of the end of June, was reported to be $764 million.

headline: Mizuho lifts price targets on global AI server stocks

headline: 2 S&P 500 Stocks with Exciting Potential and 1 We Turn Down
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is often seen as a benchmark for strong businesses, but that doesn’t mean every stock is worth owning. Some companies face significant challenges, whether it’s stagnating growth, heavy debt, or disruptive new competitors.
